Un clasico, es un juego que no puede faltar si lo tuyo es ser competitivo

Updated my review on this. Played this game for 6 years and it always delivered for me. Its esports scene has recently seen a revival and the competitive experience is still pretty much the same in terms of toxicity and all. Remember to take a break if you are having a bad day of ranked, we always have our casual and community servers to chill in. Cheers!
This game is my life, if you like esports and team strategie games in general, this game is a yes in your list.
